website_summaries.verdict: Women looking for a comprehensive down jacket will find their match in this high-quality product from Columbia.
pros: Innovative omni-heat reflective material allows body heat to warm up interior of jacket
Jacket is 600 goose down fill for severe weather conditions
Covers upper body down to knees
cons: A few buyers wished the jacket was warmer

customer_reviews.title: If you live somewhere like I do where the temperatures can drop into the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've lived in Chicago for 16 years, and this is probably the warmest parka I've owned yet! It's very lightweight, but the down feathers and reflective lining really do the trick! We've had some cold days recently, and I've been able to walk around outside for extended periods while remaining warm and cozy. I saw on some of the reviews that some people had issues with the feathers coming out, but I've been wearing this coat almost every single day since I received it and haven't encountered that problem! If you live somewhere like I do where the temperatures can drop into the single digits, this is definitely the coat to buy! 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable coat. I like tha zipper/Velcro closure combo
customer_reviews.text: Th pros: Very soft, light weight, comfortable coat. I like tha zipper/Velcro closure combo. I'm 5'5" and curvy, and a medium fit me just fine. The cons: It sheds. I read it in other reviews and took the chance anyway. So far, only the outside sheds. The silver insulating lining isn't shedding yet. Also, it offers little to no protection from the wind. Nice idea, by the way, the silver lining (see what I did there?) Not sure if it will work like a heat blanket but I like the thought. I will keep this jacket because it fits well and is cute. The shedding isn't so bad as to make me return it - yet.
customer_reviews.author: DogMomTo2

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9, ~160#. I typically size up in jackets because the arms can be too short. This jacket fit perfectly, arms fit well and plenty of room in my shoulders, so I stayed true to size, and ordered a medium. Hit somewhere in the middle between my knees and butt. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: columbia winter coat
customer_reviews.text: Nice coat, very light weight and comfortable. Purchased a medium so I would have room for bulkier clothes underneath (blazers, sweaters). the coat fits loose around the middle which I am fine with. For reference 5'1", 118 lbs. Haven't worn it yet so I can't rate the warmth but I have other columbia coats and they keep me warm. I am sure this one will too. Shipped and arrived within days of ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: cal

customer_reviews.title: While the build is nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Product catches on the zipper almost every time it's zipped up, feathers are already starting to get pushed out of the jacket. While the build is nice and soft, this doesn't seem like a durable daily wearer. We are disappointed we can't return it to be honest, because we pulled the tag off.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket  but I expected more
customer_reviews.text: In overall I like this jacket, it's moderate warm, very lightweight, stylish, It fit me in my standart for Columbia size. What I dislike : it's not windproof, I often feel chill wind, its she'll is very thin and I fear to tear it easily, and it's drop feathers. I hate feathers all over my jacket, it's seen very clear on black. So I still searching for very warm synthetic insulated winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Igor G

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Good coat. I am 5'2, 105 pounds and the xs comes down to my knee-caps and fits nicely (even with a sweater). My only complaint is its hard to zip sometimes. You have to have the zipper in there just right or you will risk ripping the zipper line. However, there is minor feather shedding on the coat. Its definitely light and not bulky. I'll report back when I wear the coat in 10 degree weather (and less). *For the life of me, I cannot figure out the pull strings on the inside of this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Jacket arrived broken: snap at the hem at the bottom of the zipper was not installed properly. Grommet had fallen out while in the packaging and there is a hole belching feathers where half the snap should be. Very disappointed as the Columbia brand has a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Murray

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! Not crazy how shiny the inside is but it does radiate your body heat back to you. So lightweight that you wouldn’t think it would be warm enough-but it is! Haven’t worn it yet when the weather is in the teens but have when it was in the low 30’s.
customer_reviews.author: Teach-R

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this jacket. The biggest pro is how warm it is. I'm living in 15 degree weather and it keeps me warm everyday. The reason I'm a little upset is that with just ONE WEEK of use, the right hand zipper is broken and the main frontal zipper gets caught all the time. Also, there are small feathers coming out everywhere. This is my first Columbia coat and I had very high expectations. I'm unable to return it because it is my only coat and I can't go without one while living here. Bottom line, it is warm and stylish but does not meet quality standards.
customer_reviews.author: Desirée

customer_reviews.title: felt a little too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter since she's going to school in Utah for the winter. She thought it felt a little too thin and flimsy. Probably fine for Seattle winter, but not good enough for Utah winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Warm, not too puffy
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! I don’t like huge puffy coats and most of the time wear a vest to avoid the suffocating feeling. This jacket is light but very warm. I wish the hand pockets were a little bigger to accommodate phone/wallet/keys. The hood does not stay up, but I don’t really use it anyways. I could see the Velcro closure over the zipper getting full of fuzzies from sweaters/scarfs etc. over time.
customer_reviews.author: Wrigley17

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Rocks!

customer_reviews.author: Paula S. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Feathers EVERYWHERE

Really embarrassing. I gave it a good month of wear in hopes that they’d stop but no... my husband has the same jacket and he’s doesn’t have that defect. i returned it and got a non-down jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: The coats great, the zipper sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this coat 5 stars because I love so much about it. However the zipper is such low quality that I am constantly struggling with it. If columbia would fix this problem it would be the best coat I have ever had. Well worth the money unless you're trapped in it by the stupid zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Cori N. Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions about coat.

customer_reviews.title: Medium fit with room for layers 5'9" 160  lbs

I ordered the medium and there is room for sweaters. It covers my tush which was the main reason I bought it. It's light weight and a very cute cut. Most puffy coats make me look like a marshmallow but this one somehow makes me look thinner than I am. Only complaint is it had a few loose threads. I haven't noticed any loose seams but I'm being extra careful with it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice and kept me totally warm!!

customer_reviews.author: amy convery

customer_reviews.title: A one winter purchase

I've only worn it for a few weeks and I wonder if there will be any feathers left in it by the end of winter. Some stitching on the interior also came undone. I'm thinking I will have to buy another jacket next year.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that fits!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! I have had trouble finding a parka that fits well. I have a smaller upper body and wider hips, so jackets are either too big in the top or too small in the bottom. This one is perfect because it has the adjustable drawstring around the waist. The jacket is very warm with the Omniheat technology, but still light weight and easy to move around in or pack down in a suitcase. I have had several Columbia jackets and they have all held up very well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this coat
customer_reviews.text: This coat is awesome. It is light-weight but warm; living in Colorado that is a must. The pockets are just big enough for my hands, which is fine with me, the pockets are at the perfect location and keep my hands nice and warm. The good is the perfect size and not cumbersome; you can still see when you turn your head. I recommend this coat to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Easy to pack. Light weight.

Very terrible customer service, and poor quality for a "Columbia"!! Don't buy!!

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but really warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat it's very flattering for a puffer coat. It's really light weight but holds in heat when needed. It's nice and airy so you don't have to take it off while shopping but definitely keeps me warm outside. Only down side is don't know how long the coat will hold up. The hard part of the Velcro is exposed on the left side of coat and when driving or reaching across your body the stitching on the sleeves snags on the velcro. I already have two of the quilted stitching out. It also snags my sons coat when holding him.

customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, I am very happy I purchased it!!! I went outside to take out some trash wearing only a t-shirt under this jacket and was very warm, the temperature outside was only 1 degrees and a windchill of -19 degrees!!! It is also machine washable, I just washed it for the first time and put it in the dryer and it came out very nice!!! I would recommend this jacket to anyone!!!

customer_reviews.title: This coat is amazing. I am allergic to the cold and wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: This coat is amazing. I am allergic to the cold and wanted to invest in something that would hold up against western KS cold winds. Today I wore it in 14 degree weather felt like 2 with a 11mph wind and I was perfectly warm almost hot. Inside my house I was sweating. Can't wait to test it when we have -13 wind chill because I'm certain I will be cozy in my coat. I bought a L and the sizing was spot on too.
